title: Koyva (settlement)
text: Koyva () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">settlement</a>) in <a href="Gornozavodsky%20District">Gornozavodsky District</a>, <a href="Perm%20Krai">Perm Krai</a>, Russia. The population was 302 as of 2010. There are 21 streets.
